categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Clone Wars

nodes.text: The Zillo Blaster was a Republic RX-200 Falchion-class assault tank used by clone troopers of the Grand Army of the Republic.
The Zillo Blaster concept art was seen in the Star Wars.com Concept Art Gallery for the Star Wars: The Clone Wars Season Two episode, The Zillo Beast, albeit not seen directly in the episode.
